All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AI
A class used to perform logic based functions in a game with AI opponents
Aircraft
A class used to represent a type of ship position -> Example: {(1,2), (1,3), (1,4), (1,5), (1,6)} maxSquares -> Always 5 SquaresLeft -> Indicates the number of Squares Alive, it always starts with 5
BarChart
Used to build the visuals for the statistics viewing
BattleView
A class used to visually demonstrate to the user what occurs during a battle
BattleViewController
A class to manage user interaction with the view about a Battle
BlankPlotChart
Used to create a skeleton for displaying user statistics
BlankPlotChatRender
An abstract class used to represent what will be A BlankPlotChat
Board_
This object with this entity is to create an object that simulates a Board with some properties
BoardDAO
An interface developed for the saving and loading of games
BoardGrid
A class used to show the board on a JPanel
BoardManager
A class used to handle the data related to a board
ButtonShape
A class created to make our own button
Cell
This object with this entity is to create an object that simulates a CELL with some properties
Cell_
This object with this entity is to create an object that simulates a CELL with some properties
CellController
A class used to dictate logic regarding a cell \
ColorLibrary
Class used to keep track of the colors our group has used throughout the project
ConfigBoardController
Used to determine logic based on ConfigBoardView input
ConfigBoardView
A class to be used when a user is determining the layout of their board
ConfigDAO
An interface used for the DB configuration file
ConfigJSONDAO
A class used to obtain the information from the DB configuration file in a JSON format
ConfigObject
A class used to directly represent the information from the file /Files/config.json that obtains the information about our DB
ContinueGameController
Used to determine what the next step is based on the input receved in the corresponding view
ContinueGameView
Used to provide the user with options regarding a game
Destroyer
Used to represent a type of ship position -> Example: {(1,2), (1,3), (1,4), (1,5), (1,6)} maxSquares -> Always 5 SquaresLeft -> Indicates the number of Squares Alive, it always starts with 4
FormManager
A class used to handle the different Views and their screens with the information the user could submit
Game
The class used to run the logic behind simulating an actual game
GameDao
Used to communicate to the database and JSONDAO
GameJSONDAO
A class containing the logic for saving and loading a game
GameListener
A class used to communicate to boards during games
GameManager
A class to handle outside interactions for the class Game.java
GameObject
A class used to represent a Game before it is stored When developing this class it was tempting to utilize the 'real' game class but that class contains methods and variables not important for the persistence process for this reason this class was created to simply code
ImageFeatures
Class used for the rescaling of an image
JBackgroundPanel
Custom JPanel that renders an image in the background
LabelColor
Used to provide color in visualization
LegendItem
Class used to place a componenet on the legend
LoginController
Used to determine the logic behind when a user logs in
LoginView
A class used to design the visuals in Swing regarding the user login
LogoutButton
Used to create a button to allow the user to logout
LogoutController
Used to driver logic behind the logoutView
LogoutView
A class used to visualize when a user logs out
Main
 
MainMenuController
Used to determine what is required to do based on the user input in the main menu
MainMenuView
A class used to visualize the main menu
MainView
The class the brings the entire view together, being able to direct the user at the beginning of the program
ModelChart
Class used to visualize the statics of a user in a game
ModelLegend
Class used to provide information about a graphics to the user
MyClock
A class designed to simulate like a clock when needing to keep track of tiem
NewGameController
Used to determine the logic required to perform the user choice in the newGame View
NewGameView
Used to Visualize a new game in SWING format
NiceScale
Class used to nicely format one statistic visual
Part
A class used to represent a slice of pie of a pie Chart
PieChart
Used to be able to visualize our data in a PIEchart format
Player
Game is formed by a list of players
Point
A class used to represet a point on the graph of the game
RegisterController
A class used to obtain the choice from the user in the RegisterView and then do something based on the input
RegisterView
A class to construct the visualization when a user is signing up
RulesPanel
Used to show the rules relating to the game
SeriesSize
A class used to determine sizes and scales for the visualization
Ship
Class used to represent ships position -> Example: {(1,2), (1,3), (1,4), (1,5), (1,6)} maxSquares -> Always 5 SquaresLeft -> Indicates the number of Squares Alive, it always starts with 5

Class used to represent a type of ship position -> Example: {(1,2), (1,3), (1,4), (1,5), (1,6)} maxSquares -> Always 5 SquaresLeft -> Indicates the number of Squares Alive, it always starts with 2

Used to be able to run commands on the database for a game
SQLUserDAO
Used to be able to run commands on the database for a user

Used to deal with user input from the statistics view

Class used for displaying stats about a game

A class used for displaying statistics about a game

Class used to represent a user of the game

Used to connect the Db to to the program
